import{configureStore,getDefaultMiddleware}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";// eslint-disable-next-line import/no-cycle
import gridReducer from"../grid/gridSlice";export var store=configureStore({reducer:{grid:gridReducer},middleware:getDefaultMiddleware({/**
		 * allow using `Uint8Array`s
		 */serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:["grid/clickSquare","grid/invert"],ignoredPaths:["grid.grid","grid.indicesOfShortestPathSquares"]}})});
